name: No Mis-steaks
description:
Welcome to No Mis-steaks, the game where you play as the sole chef in a busy restaurant. Cook burgers for your customers to keep them happy, and the more pleased each customer is with their meal, the higher your score. But be careful, making a customer wait for too long or serving them a raw or burnt burger will decrease your score. Keep you rating high, as if it drops to 0 stars you lose!

Submitted for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

Music from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
